page.title: 01LYNEHAM VILLAGE
page.content:
LYNEHAM IS A VERY PLEASANT VILLAGE SURROUNDED BY BEAUTIFUL COUNTRYSIDE WHICH IS MAINLY FARM-LAND THE SMALL VILLAGES OF BRADENSTOKE, TOCKENHAM, NEW_ZEALAND, AND GOATACRE ARE CLOSE BY. THERE ARE SOME PLEASANT WALKS ACROSS THE FIELDS TO THESE SURROUNDING VILLAGES. WHAT WAS ONCE A SLEEPY PART OF OLD ENGLAND IS NOW R.A.F. LYNEHAM, THE PRINCIPAL TACTICAL TRANSPORT BASE IN THE UK. BEFORE WORLD WAR 2,LYNEHAM WAS A SMALL VILLAGE WITH ITS ROOTS IN THE TURBULENT PAST.R.A.F.. LYNEHAM IS A VERY IMPORTANT PART OF LYNEHAM NOW,OPEN 24HRS. A DAY,EVERY DAY OF THE YEAR ,
S
